targets.expr: 100 * sum(rpc_requests_succeeded_total or vector(0)) / (sum(rpc_requests_total or vector(0)) or vector(1))
100 * (1 - sum(rate(rpc_requests_succeeded_total[$rate_interval]) or vector(0)) / (sum(rate(rpc_requests_total[$rate_interval]) or vector(0)) or vector(1)))
100 * sum(rate(endpoint_rate_limit_deferred_total[$rate_interval]) or vector(0)) / (sum(rate(rpc_requests_total[$rate_interval]) or vector(0)) or vector(1))
sum(rate(rpc_request_duration_seconds_sum[$rate_interval]) or vector(0)) / (sum(rate(rpc_request_duration_seconds_count[$rate_interval]) or vector(0)) or vector(1)) * 1000
sum(rate(rpc_request_duration_seconds_sum[$rate_interval]) or vector(0)) / (sum(rate(rpc_request_duration_seconds_count[$rate_interval]) or vector(0)) or vector(1)) * 1000

sum(rate(rpc_request_duration_seconds_sum[$rate_interval]) or vector(0)) / 
(sum(rate(rpc_request_duration_seconds_count[$rate_interval]) or vector(0)) or vector(1)) * 1000

panels.description: Detailed table of endpoint performance metrics

targets.expr: label_replace(100 * (rpc_requests_succeeded_total{endpoint=~"$endpoint"} or vector(0)) / ((rpc_requests_succeeded_total{endpoint=~"$endpoint"} or vector(0)) + (rpc_requests_failed_total{endpoint=~"$endpoint"} or vector(0)) or vector(1)), "endpoint_short", "$1", "endpoint", "https://([^/]+).*")

panels.title: Endpoint Performance Table
